text.text: You were once a magicless being.
You wanted this to change, but it came with a cost.
A powerful warlock has given you the power of a seer, but you were also cursed.
The curse caused you some pain in the beginning, but now it is starting to consume your life, nearing your death.
Your days are numbered and it is urgent to find a charm to list the curse.
You have to find the witch and get her signature which will lift the curse.
